name: CybersecurityBestPracticesForIoT
description: A template for ensuring IoT devices adhere to cybersecurity best practices, including secure communication, regular updates, and strong authentication.

goals.name: Ensure Cybersecurity in IoT Devices
goals.short_description: Secure IoT devices against potential cyber threats.
goals.long_description: This goal focuses on implementing and maintaining high cybersecurity standards across IoT devices to protect against unauthorized access, data breaches, and other cyber threats.
goals.keywords: cybersecurity, IoT, secure communication, software updates, authentication

context.name: IoT Deployment Context
context.short_description: The environment in which IoT devices are deployed.
context.long_description: Describes the varied environments IoT devices operate in, including home, industrial, and public spaces, and the unique security challenges each presents.

property_claims.name: Secure Communication Protocols
property_claims.short_description: IoT devices use secure communication protocols.
property_claims.long_description: Ensures that all data transmitted by IoT devices is encrypted and secure from interception or tampering.

evidence.name: Encryption Standards Compliance
evidence.long_description: Documented evidence that IoT devices comply with industry-standard encryption protocols for secure communication.

property_claims.name: Regular Software Updates
property_claims.short_description: IoT devices receive regular software updates.
property_claims.long_description: IoT devices are regularly updated to address security vulnerabilities and enhance functionality.

evidence.name: Update Policy Documentation
evidence.short_description: Documentation of the software update policy.
evidence.long_description: A policy document detailing the frequency, method, and security measures for software updates on IoT devices.

property_claims.name: Robust Authentication Mechanisms
property_claims.short_description: IoT devices implement robust authentication mechanisms.
property_claims.long_description: Authentication mechanisms are in place to verify the identity of users and devices, preventing unauthorized access.

evidence.name: Authentication Protocol Audit
evidence.long_description: An external audit report confirming that IoT devices employ strong authentication protocols to ensure secure access.
